New Records: Ja Morant, Jaylen Wells, and Jaren Jackson Jr. each scored 20 points in the game.
The Memphis Grizzlies shot 48% from the three-point line during the game.
Key Match Events: Jay Huff's three consecutive three-pointers and a reverse dunk in the third quarter turned the game in favor of the Grizzlies.
The Lakers struggled from three-point range, shooting only 25%.
Pre-Game Insights: Los Angeles Lakers center Anthony Davis and forward Rui Hachimura were absent due to injuries, impacting their performance.
Memphis Grizzlies head coach Taylor Jenkins missed the game due to a family death, with assistant Tuomas Iisalo leading the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was followed by notes on the teams' upcoming matches.
